content.rendered:
There has never been a better time to book a rafting trip with AVA than now! With current temperatures in the 50s, winter is certainly not acting like winter and is getting us in the paddling mood. To help get you in the rafting spirit we are offering some phenomenal savings on various rafting and ziplining trips! Take a look below to see some of our current deals and discounts.

The Colorado River is a wonderful place. It is filled with pristine scenic beauty and abundant in wildlife, and we want to share it with you! Currently all, that’s right all, Upper Colorado River trips are buy one, get one half off. Book a trip on the Upper C and see what this state named river has to offer.

If looking for a mini-summer vacation then head on down to the Arkansas River. Offering beginner, intermediate, and advanced rafting trips in overnights, full days, and half days there is a trip for all. However, when you book a full day of rafting Sunday-Thursday you get free camping! Raft the day away and spend the night under the stars on the Arkansas!

Back by popular demand are our Early Bird and Happy Hour discounts on Clear Creek. Just 45 minutes west of Denver the Clear Creek River is home to beginner, intermediate, and advanced whitewater. Our Early Bird discount is available on our beginner and intermediate rafting, as well as our ziplining, at 8:30am and 8am Monday-Thursday. If you prefer to do your adventuring at dusk then our Happy Hour discount is right up your alley. Offered on the exact same trips as our Early Bird discount except at 5pm, 5:30pm, and 6pm, our Happy Hour discount is your ticket for some sunset adventure!

Whether you are looking for a half day of rafting, or a full day with a side of camping, AVA has the package for you. With our deals and discounts we have made it easier than ever to save while having the adventure of the summer! For a complete list of all deals and discounts be sure to check out our Deals page.
